column1: Allow only Registration of School or Households via Register Button
Register Individual through Household Add New Member Flow
Add, Group Affiliation for linking with School as part of Individual Registration, where person is of School going age

column10:
"1st Visit : 
Due: after 3 months from School Health - Screening 
Overdue: 10 days after the scheduled date.

2nd Visit Onwards:
Due: after 3 months of from previous School Health - Follow up 
Overdue: 10 days after the scheduled date




Note: Schedule if 

1. "In School Health Screening for Hb count is 

Severe Anaemia
Moderate Anaemia
Mild Anaemia 

and 

2. Age of individual is 5-19 years


"
column12:
Schedule the next visit using the same scheduling logic from the date of cancellation.

Example 

School Health - Follow up Visit 1: Cancellation Date: July 24, 2025
Schedule School Health - Follow up Visit 2: July 24 + 3 months = October 24, 2025

column10:
1st Visit : 
Due: Immediately after enrolmeny
Overdue: 10 days after the scheduled date.

2nd Visit Onwards:
Due: Every 30 days after the previous visit. 
Overdue: 10 days after the scheduled date.


Note: Next visit should not get scheduled unless the previous is completed"
column12:
Schedule the next visit using the same logic from the date of cancellation.

Example 
ANC 1 cancelled on July 24
ANC 2 is due 30 days after July 24

July 24 + 30 days = August 23, 2025

column12:
Schedule the next visit using the same logic from the date of cancellation.

Example:
Child Follow Up 1 is cancelled on July 24th.

Schedule Child Follow Up 2 
Child Follow Up 2 is due 14 days from the cancellation date.

Child Follow Up 2 due date = August 7th (July 24 + 14 days)
